long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IG Exporter & Scraper is a powerful Google Chrome extension and scraping tool for gathering Instagram comments. Export your data effortlessly into CSV and Excel formats. Perfect for analytics, content management, and social media strategies. Use this best-in-class online service to scrape data from Instagram for free, making it the ideal web scraping tool!

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬  How to Use ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
1. Click Ins Tools - Ins Comments Export Tool icon, which is on browser toolbar, then open IGTools popup page via IGTools Net
2. Click "Export Instagram Data" button, an IGTools option page will be opened.
3. Input a valid IG post URL
4. Click "Start export" button, and our IG Tools will run automatically. After this processing is finished, you can download IG comments to CSV or Excel. 

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Features ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
● Export IG comments with one click by extension
● Export up to 50K IG comments
● CSV and Excel formats support
● Handles IG rate limit errors
● Processing in one click via IGTools net

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Supported columns ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
- comment_id
- text
- created_at
- user_id
- username
- profile_pic_url

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Security ▬▬▬▬▬▬
● The extension neither ask for your IG password, nor any of your data including IG user information, story, visit history, posts, and social relationships.
● IG enforces IG rate limit, i.e. limit on the number of requests. The rate limit is not public information and varies depending on your IP address.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ How it works in IG Follower Export tool ▬▬▬▬▬▬
● After every time you get 50 comments the extension goes to Cool down minimum 10 seconds (you can change it in settings tab).
